metadata.description: Meet Claire Sinclair (Bettie Page spokesmodel and 2011 Playmate of the Year), re-imagined as a financially struggling college student who volunteers for a medical study for some quick cash. Claire is shocked to find that she now possesses superpowers. When she realizes that her ex-boyfriend also has powers that he's using to go on a citywide crime spree, it's supervillain vs. superhero - but will old feelings get in the way?
metadata.name: Wonderous: The Adventures of Claire Sinclair
